definition: to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: Dry-treated - Ropes that have been coated with or immersed in a water-repellent chemical.
sentences.chinese: 外層塗抹或浸入一種防水化學物質的繩索。

sentences.english: Investigation was carried out for water penetration into moso bamboo (Phyllostachys pubescens), grown in Fuyang, Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 研究生長於浙江省富陽的毛竹的水分浸入特性。

sentences.english: And you give a picture of that by going under the water and coming up.
sentences.chinese: 你要表明這一點，就要藉着浸入水中和從水裏出來。

sentences.english: She dunked a piece of white cloth in the dye.
sentences.chinese: 她把一塊白布浸入染料中。

sentences.english: In the derivation both the induced vibration and couple vibration were considerd.
sentences.chinese: 本文建立了浸入水中輸運流體管道耦合振動微分方程。

sentences.english: The worker bathed machine parts in the oil.
sentences.chinese: 工人把機器零件浸入機油中。

sentences.english: Dip into beaten eggs then dredge with seasoned bread crumbs.
sentences.chinese: 浸入打好的蛋液中，再撈出裹上面包屑。

sentences.english: Causes the pathogenic bacteria to plunge the organization and from to entangle greatly breeds, but pathogenesis.

sentences.english: Do not immerge the resin to the soldering stove.
sentences.chinese: 請避免樹脂部分浸入錫槽。

sentences.english: Heat evaporate face water very hot, with towel immerge, pigheaded dry rear cover is in 5 minutes on the face.

sentences.english: He dipped his hand into the pool.
He has immerged the dress in the boiling dye for two hours.
sentences.chinese: 他已把衣服浸入滾燙的染料中兩個小時了。

sentences.english: He produced the desired results by joining two sheets of fabric with dissolved India rubber soaked in naphtha.
sentences.chinese: 製造過程爲將兩種布料浸入溶解有印度橡膠的輕油中。

sentences.english: The Lord dipped His hand into the water and pulled up a golden thimble set with sapphires.
sentences.chinese: 上帝把手浸入水中撈出一個鑲嵌着藍寶石的金頂針。

sentences.english: Mary dipped her head into the clear pool.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗將頭浸入清水池中。

sentences.english: Never immerse the motor unit in water.
sentences.chinese: 切勿將馬達裝置浸入水中。

definition: (usually of sth intangible) to seep into/to permeate
to permeate/to percolate/fig. to saturate (with emotion)
to spread out after being diluted or melted/to dissolve into a liquid
to melt/to thaw/to dissolve/to blend into/to combine/to fuse
